resources.string: Your email is used to admin your Canvass devices
Bluetooth has to be enabled for new Canvass setup. Turn on Bluetooth from your phone\'s settings and return to the app.
Location Services is needed for Canvass setup. Grant the permission from your phone\'s settings and return to the app.
Discovered devices would show up here.
Select your Colaj from the list of devices below. If your device doesn\'t show up, you can hit the Retry button below or try restarting your Colaj.
Choose the Wi-Fi network you would like to use with your Colaj
Choose the Colaj you\'d like to setup
No device was found. \n Ensure your Colaj is turned on and try again
WiFi Access is needed for completing Canvass setup. Grant the permission from your device\'s settings and return to the app
There\'s a whole world of art waiting to be seen. Let\'s get started

To manage & upload images to your Colaj, your email address is used. A code would be sent to the email you provided. Just enter the code you\'d receive and you\'d be on your merry way. That\'s one less password to remember.
Kindly check your email for a verification code we sent you. If you don\'t find it in your inbox, kindly check your spam folder.
